wikipedia_page.main: Henry Neville "Mick" Southern (28 September 1908 – 25 August 1986) was an English ornithologist.

response: * Henry Neville Southern (1908–1986) ornithologistWiley Online Library, 1987, OBITUARIES H. N. Southern retrieved 19 January 2018

link_mentions.page: Union Medal of the British Ornithological Union
response: *	1971 Stephen Marchant, Henry Neville Southern, Bernard Stonehouse

King got her first PhD in Zoology from the University of Oxford entitled 'Studies on the ecology of the weasel (Mustela nivalis L.)' studying under ornithologist Henry Neville Southern, before moving to DSIR's Ecology Division and from there to the University of Waikato, where she rose to full professor.
